c41d67bb-f0ad-4eef-a996-d67b896d595a.description: Earners of the CMPE designation have demonstrated deep understanding and knowledge of the principles of medical practice administration and the application of those principles to real-life situations and scenarios in healthcare. Earners are able to successfully manage all aspects of a medical practice with increased operational efficiencies as key performance indicators of the ability to hold the standard knowledge of the Body of Knowledge for medical practice management.
c41d67bb-f0ad-4eef-a996-d67b896d595a.name: Board Certified through the American College of Medical Practice Executives (CMPE)

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

alignments.name: American College of Medical Practice Executives
alignments.description: American College of Medical Practice Executives (ACMPE), established in 1975 to deliver and promote the highest educational standards and professional proficiency in medical group practice administration. As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige and collegiality of the ACMPE Certificates, Certification, and Fellow.

badge_template_activities.title: To apply, you must be a current MGMA member and meet one of the following pathways: Pathway One: Hold a Bachelor's Degree or have completed 120 college credit hours and at least two years of healthcare experience. Pathway Two: Be working on a Bachelors Degree and/or two years of healthcare experience. Pathway Three: Have six years of healthcare experience with at least four years in a leadership/management role.
A 175-item multiple choice test taken within three hours and 15 minutes with at least a 500/800 passing score

A 90-item scenario-based test with items of multi-select, multiple choice, or drag and drop questions pertaining to practice administration scenarios taken within two hours with passing score of 500/800.
A cumulative total of 50 continuing education credit hours.

35420742-4533-4ad7-b098-46c60d6edc46.description: Earners of the FACMPE designation have demonstrated skills and abilities that contribute to the advancement of medical practice leadership and the healthcare industry as a thought leader capable of identifying key improvement areas for the sustainability and success of an organization. Earners are able to innovatively think, manage change in the complex healthcare environment, and problem-solve to tackle the greatest challenges in a healthcare organization.
35420742-4533-4ad7-b098-46c60d6edc46.name: Fellow of the American College of Medical Practice Executives (FACMPE)

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

alignments.name: American College Of Medical Practice Executives
alignments.description: American College of Medical Practice Executives (ACMPE), established in 1975 to deliver and promote the highest educational standards and professional proficiency in medical group practice administration. As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige and collegiality of the ACMPE Certificates, Certification, and Fellow.

badge_template_activities.title: Earn the Certified Medical Practice Executive (CMPE) credential and hold in active and good standing.

Be a current MGMA member. Pay an application fee. Hold a Bachelor's degree with at least five years of healthcare experience OR Hold a Master's degree with at least three years of healthcare experience.
Demonstrate leadership, innovation, and professional engagement in the healthcare industry and the advancement of the medical group management profession.

To demonstrate leadership, innovation, and strategic planning skills: Complete one or more leadership opportunities to a total of 15 hours. Must demonstrate healthcare leadership and medical group management OR Hold the CMPE designation for at least six years and complete 25 continuing education hours pertaining to leadership.
Complete 6-12 volunteer hours depending on your pathway.
Receive approval from ACMPE Certification Commission and MGMA Board.

c846b0a4-07d1-4cd7-a142-a8672b384820.description: Earners of the Payer Contracting Certificate have completed the Payer Contracting Program. This online learning experience that provides healthcare leaders with knowledge to gathering and analyzing contracts, articulating practice value, developing contract proposals and building a go-forward strategy, establishing a contract monitoring and evaluation process.
c846b0a4-07d1-4cd7-a142-a8672b384820.name: Payer Contracting Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

alignments.name: American College of Medical Practice Executives
alignments.description: American College of Medical Practice Executives (ACMPE), established in 1975 to deliver and promote the highest educational standards and professional proficiency in medical group practice administration. As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige and collegiality of the ACMPE Certificates, Certification, and Fellow.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 6 hour course covering the following:  Part I: Gathering and Analyzing Your Contracts  Part II: Articulating Practice Value, Developing Contract Proposals and Building a Go-Forward Strategy  Part III: Establishing a Contract Monitoring and Evaluation Process  Part IV: Closing Session — Reflections and Takeaways.
Complete and pass post assessment ensuring learning objective have been met.

78a8e169-3de8-4f3c-9615-99357f38b3fb.description: Earners of the Revenue Cycle Management Certificate have completed the online learning experience. This program that provides healthcare leaders with knowledge to assess and master revenue cycle management, estimate the impact of daily activities upon the revenue cycle, determine methods for continuous revenue cycle improvement and ongoing oversight.
78a8e169-3de8-4f3c-9615-99357f38b3fb.name: Revenue Cycle Management Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

alignments.name: American College of Medical Practice Executives
alignments.description: American College of Medical Practice Executives (ACMPE), established in 1975 to deliver and promote the highest educational standards and professional proficiency in medical group practice administration. As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige and collegiality of the ACMPE Certificates, Certification, and Fellow.

badge_template_activities.title: ompletion of a six -hour course covering the following:  Part I: Patient Access & Pre-Visit Services  Part II: Claim Preparation (Mid-Cycle)  Part III: Payment Oversight  Part IV: KPIs, Quality Programs & Reporting (KQR).
Complete and pass post assessment ensuring learning objective have been met.

2279b3fd-663b-4352-84f3-e35226348928.description: Earners of the HRMC designation have completed the in-depth online learning experience that provides healthcare leaders with a mastery of human resource management. Concepts included are including staffing plans, recruitment, and compensation/benefits; employee engagement and talent management; and labor relations and employment law, which are aligned with the MGMA-ACMPE Human Resources Management Domain in the Body of Knowledge.
2279b3fd-663b-4352-84f3-e35226348928.name: Human Resources Management Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives (HRMC)

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

alignments.name: American College of Medical Practice Executives
alignments.description: American College of Medical Practice Executives (ACMPE), established in 1975 to deliver and promote the highest educational standards and professional proficiency in medical group practice administration. As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige and collegiality of the ACMPE Certificates, Certification, and Fellow.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a two day, 8-hour online program, covering  staffing plans, recruitment, and compensation/benefits; employee engagement and talent management; and labor relations and employment law.
Complete and pass post assessment(s) ensuring learning objectives have been met.

bbc63bc4-8680-4c1a-8a21-c5865fe4541f.description: Earners of the OMC designation have completed the in-depth online learning experience that provides healthcare leaders with a mastery of operations management. Concepts include general practice operations, project management and strategic planning, healthcare data analytics, supply chain, asset and facility management, information technology and cyber security, communications, marketing, and community relations, aligned with the MGMA-ACMPE Operations Management Body of Knowledge.
bbc63bc4-8680-4c1a-8a21-c5865fe4541f.name: Operations Management Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives (OMC)

As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige and collegiality of the ACMPE Certificates, Certification, and Fellow.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the full 14-hour online program, covering concepts of General Practice Operations, Project Management and Strategic Planning, Healthcare Data Analytics, Supply Chain, Asset and Facility Management, Information Technology and Cybersecurity, Communications, Marketing and Community Relations
Complete post assessments ensuring learning objective have been met.

4e24b355-1772-4f8f-b0c0-4d4d901497d2.description: Earners of the Financial Reporting and Budgeting Certificate have completed the online learning experience. This program that provides healthcare leaders with knowledge to produce budgets and forecasts, manage financial reports, apply strategies that make your practice audit-ready and demonstrate the impact of corporate taxes on your practice.
4e24b355-1772-4f8f-b0c0-4d4d901497d2.name: Financial Reporting and Budgeting Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a two hour course covering the following:  Part I: Budget Creation and Management  Part II: Financial Reporting  Part III: Audit Management  Part IV: Corporate Tax Reporting.
Complete and pass post assessment ensuring learning objective have been met.

f533d37d-111d-468a-b6bd-a625ca644c3f.description: Earners of the Cash Flow, Accounts Payable and Payroll Management Certificate have completed the online learning experience. This program that provides healthcare leaders with knowledge to manage cashflow in a productive and meaningful way, apply a basic understanding of bookkeeping and internal cash controls, and employ strategies to manage the practice payroll.
f533d37d-111d-468a-b6bd-a625ca644c3f.name: Cash Flow, Accounts Payable and Payroll Management Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a three -hour course covering the following:  Part I: Cash Flow Management  Part II: Financial Reporting  Part III: Payroll Management.
Complete and pass post assessment ensuring learning objective have been met.

158f73d7-5786-4428-b6f0-6278ce3ce744.description: Earners of the FMC designation have completed the in-depth online learning experience that provides healthcare leaders with a mastery of financial management. Concepts include payer contracting, Revenue Cycle Management, Accounts Payable, Payroll and Cash Flow Management, and Financial Reporting and Budgeting, aligned with the MGMA-ACMPE Financial Management Body of Knowledge.
158f73d7-5786-4428-b6f0-6278ce3ce744.name: Financial Management Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives (FMC)

As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige and collegiality of the ACMPE Certificates, Certification, and Fellow.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the full 17-hour online program, covering: Part I: Payer Contracting  Part II: Revenue Cycle Management  Part III: Accounts Payable, Payroll and Cash Flow Management Part IV: Financial Reporting and Budgeting
Complete post assessment(s) ensuring learning objectives have been met.

0b7fe840-eda3-4721-9074-29b35b414291.description: Medical practices and healthcare organizations earn the MGMA DataDive Better Performer status through demonstrated success in four critical areas of success, including Operations, Profitability, Productivity and Value.
0b7fe840-eda3-4721-9074-29b35b414291.name: MGMA DataDive Better Performer 2022

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

badge_template_activities.title: Participation across all three MGMA DataDive Surveys (the Compensation and Production Survey, the Cost and Revenue Survey, and the Practice Operations Survey) is required to be considered for Better Performer status across all categories. Individuals must fit into the top percentiles nationally in one or all of the four evaluation areas that serve as the levers of best outcomes: Operations Profitability, Productivity and Value.

33112e40-27ca-44d2-9495-788085f4a582.description: Earners of the Principles of Practice Management Certificate have completed the online foundational certificate program that provides healthcare leaders with a overview knowledge of the key principles of running a medical practice. The program includes six parts, general practice operations, accounts payable and payroll management, financial reporting and budgeting, labor relations and employment law, revenue cycle management, and risk and compliance.
33112e40-27ca-44d2-9495-788085f4a582.name: Principles of Practice Management Certificate (PPMC)

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige and collegiality of th

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the full 15-hour online program and foundational certificate, covers the top areas domains of Operations Management, Financial Management and Human Resources Management from the MGMA-ACMPE Body of Knowledge. This certificate establishes the foundational knowledge needed for practice management has been learned by the designee.
Complete post assessments ensuring learning objective have been met.

405677ef-7f3e-4ce0-8890-f74dda200827.description: Earners of this certificate will learn about the importance of strategic planning in healthcare and how that aligns with mission, vision and values. You will also develop the skillset and tools to successfully manage a project from beginning to end. This certificate program will include an interactive case study on project management.
405677ef-7f3e-4ce0-8890-f74dda200827.name: Project Management and Strategic Planning Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige of the ACMPE Certificate, Cer

badge_template_activities.title: This 3.5-hour program will provide you with the knowledge to: Develop organizational goals and needs Design business plans aligned with strategy Generate a successful project plan and schedule Agenda Details How to Project Manage like a Boss Project Management: A Case Study The Importance of Strategic Planning In Healthcare Hope Is Not a Strategy: Strategic Planning for Medical Groups Closing Session
Complete and pass post assessment ensuring learning objective has been met.

98b215bf-9fb8-43d8-a254-290424f08c2b.description: Earners of the Healthcare Data Analytics Certificate will provide earners with a roadmap to design and implement compensation packages that support the practice’s mission. Benchmarking provides a means to assess the competitiveness of physician compensation. This certificate program will show attendees how to assess which benchmarks are needed for a compensation plan, as well as the practice’s goals and strategies.
98b215bf-9fb8-43d8-a254-290424f08c2b.name: Healthcare Data Analytics Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige of the ACMPE Certificate, Certification, and Fellowship programs.

badge_template_activities.title: This 3.5-hour program will provide you with the knowledge to: Establish a physician compensation plan that aligns with organizational goals Assess physician compensation plans via benchmarking tools Evaluate performance via analytical processes, such as Lean or total quality improvement programs
Complete and pass post assessment ensuring learning objectives have been met.

e7c19155-153c-4012-b393-b17bc05ee27a.description: Earners of the Telehealth Certificate have completed the Best Practices for Optimizing a Successful Telehealth Program online learning experience. This program that provides healthcare leaders with knowledge to establish best practices for an effective telehealth program, determine the correct coding and billing requirements for telehealth, and evaluate the latest rules in telehealth regulations.
e7c19155-153c-4012-b393-b17bc05ee27a.name: Telehealth Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige and collegiality of the ACMPE Certificates, Certification, and Fellow.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 3.25 hours course covering the following:  Part I: Federal Telehealth Policies During COVID-19  Part II: Coding and Billing Telehealth Correctly  Part III: How One Practice Found Telehealth and Telemedicine Success  Part IV: Integrate Telemedicine into Medical Practice Operations.
Complete and pass post assessment ensuring learning objective have been met.

53fd3618-6466-42fc-b26f-9bf45b2ae67b.description: Completing the Transformative Healthcare Delivery Certificate (THDC) complete an in-depth online learning experience that provides healthcare leaders with a mastery of transformative healthcare delivery and assessment. Concepts include Accountable Care Organizations (ACOs), Clinically Integrated Networks (CINs), Commercial Value-Based Care Programs and CMS’ Value-Based Care Programs, including MIPS and APMs, aligned with the MGMA-ACMPE Transformative Healthcare Delivery Body of Knowledge.
53fd3618-6466-42fc-b26f-9bf45b2ae67b.name: Transformative Healthcare Delivery Certificate through the American College of Medical Practice Executives (THDC)

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

alignments.description: American College of Medical Practice Executives (ACMPE), established in 1975 to deliver and promote the highest educational standards and professional proficiency in medical group practice administration. As the certifying body of MGMA, ACMPE maintains the rigor, value, prestige and collegiality of the ACMPE Certificates, Certification, and Fellow.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the full 9-hour program, covering concepts of Federal Policy and Advancing Value-Based Care, Keys to Participating in the Merit-based Incentive Payment System (MIPS), Accountable Care Organizations (ACOs), Clinically Integrated Networks (CINs), Commercial Value-Based Contracting Initiatives, Participating in Commercial Value-Based Models, Data and IT Infrastructure Considerations, Telehealth and Remote Patient Monitoring (RPM) to Manage Population Health.
Complete post assessments ensuring learning objectives have been met

0adc4b39-3fa2-43d4-a4f4-bc14ae87d6c0.description: As our next generation of leaders begins to emerge, we look forward to the opportunity to acknowledge their success and welcome them into a group of peers that can help them reach their full potential. The Future Five award annually recognizes five professionals within the first five years of their career who have demonstrably impacted their organization or the industry.
0adc4b39-3fa2-43d4-a4f4-bc14ae87d6c0.name: MGMA Future Five

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

badge_template_activities.title: Recipient was nominated and selected by committee as a one of five professionals within the first five years of their career who have demonstrably impacted their organization or the industry.

9249f81f-93aa-4f83-be75-ee58d827a1d9.description: This award recognizes a medical practice professional serving as a state MGMA legislative liaison volunteer who has provided outstanding leadership in the education and motivation of MGMA members through grassroots and advocacy involvement on legislative and regulatory issues of importance to medical group practices.
9249f81f-93aa-4f83-be75-ee58d827a1d9.name: MGMA Legislative Liaison of the Year

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

badge_template_activities.title: Recipient was nominated and selected by the Medical Group Management Association Government Affairs team recogniing a medical practice professional serving as a state MGMA legislative liaison volunteer who has provided outstanding leadership in the education and motivation of MGMA members through grassroots and advocacy involvement on legislative and regulatory issues of importance to medical group practices.

37953872-74c1-4f44-8dd4-f6d243bb1730.description: The award is designed to recognize and celebrate the success of an individual who has inspired and empowered other leaders through significant contributions to the healthcare industry with particular emphasis on the advancement of medical group administration, delivery and/or education.
37953872-74c1-4f44-8dd4-f6d243bb1730.name: MGMA Lifetime Achievement Award

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

badge_template_activities.title: Recipient was nominated and selected by committee recognizing and celebrating the success of an individual who has inspired and empowered other leaders through significant contributions to the healthcare industry with particular emphasis on the advancement of medical group administration, delivery and/or education.

2a12ce8f-f39f-452d-b520-9cd266237a61.description: An MGMA author understands the dynamic healthcare industry from an insider perspective. This person is a subject matter expert in their field and demonstrates an ability to share complex information through writing. Using insights, experience, and skills, this person has authored an MGMA book that proves to be a valuable tool for medical practice leaders in strengthening the future of healthcare.
2a12ce8f-f39f-452d-b520-9cd266237a61.name: MGMA Author

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

badge_template_activities.title: Authors selected by the MGMA editorial committee have exhibited subject matter expertise in medical practice fields such as revenue, staffing and management.

ec884470-fcff-4203-895e-01b5357fb47c.description: Medical Group Management Assocation's Distinguished Leaders stand out in the community as innovators and accomplished professionals who have utilized their unique and vast skillsets to advance the healthcare community through service to MGMA
ec884470-fcff-4203-895e-01b5357fb47c.name: MGMA Distinguished Leader

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

badge_template_activities.title: Recipients have served as elected members of the Medical Group Management Association Board of Directors.

d67e31cb-2c99-448b-a5b6-c1a4e558bd6a.description: We know great work is done everyday in communities throughtout the world and we want to help share these compelling stories and honor our nation's healthcare heroes. The Extraordianry Leaders Recognition recognizes those who have solved difficult problems, conquered challenging situations, inspired others through change, contributed to your community with innovation and excellence.
d67e31cb-2c99-448b-a5b6-c1a4e558bd6a.name: MGMA Extraordinary Leaders Recognition

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

badge_template_activities.title: Recipient were nominated as those who have solved difficult problems, conquered challenging situations, inspired others through change, contributed to your community with innovation and excellence.

0e2c86ad-95b9-404e-911d-65d39a45af9f.description: The award is designed to recognize and celebrate the success of an individual who has developed an innovative solution that positively impacts practices, providers and/or patients in their community.
0e2c86ad-95b9-404e-911d-65d39a45af9f.name: MGMA Harwick Innovation Award

issuer.summary: issued by Medical Group Management Association (MGMA)

badge_template_activities.title: Recipient was nominated and selected by committee for as an individual who has developed an innovative solution that positively impacts practices, providers and/or patients in their community.
